briefdescription.para: Generate hashes but don't render or download anything.
Render but don't download or hash.
Enable download (NEVER USE THIS ON ITS OWN, this is only here for checking flags, download-only mode makes no sense)
Use hash verification and render, but don't cache any frames to disk.
Render and download, but don't use hash verification.
Render and use hashes to identify exact matches (default)
VideoRenderWorker uses hashes to recognize frames that are identical to others in the render queue.

detaileddescription.para: This mode can modify the behavior of the worker, either to disable hash verification or only generate hashes and not render. These are only used in the context of exporting.
These are also flags that can be or'd together, mostly for the convenience of checking which functionalities are disabled and enabled.
